name.title: Mob Name
name.label: Custom name:
name.help: This option allows you to customize the name of the mob you will summon. The name you write here will be visible floating above the mob when you summon it in the game. You can use format codes using the & symbol followed by a number.

amount.title: Mob Amount
amount.label: Amount to summon:
amount.help: This option allows you to define how many mobs you want to summon at once. For performance and game balance reasons, the maximum limit is 20 mobs per summon.
